notes.title: **Features**
points: - - An experience bar, similar to the Activity Experience Bars (Fishing, Golfing, etc), will now appear during Cog Boss battles that Toons can level up through!
- - Briefly, you can level up by performing well in the interactive rounds of the Cog Boss (Pie Round, Crane Round, Cannon Round, etc)
- - Every 10 levels, Toons will receive some rewards that they might find cool or even useful! More details provided in the release notes.

notes.title: **Bugfixes**
points: - - Fixed an issue in which Toons could not take back a Training Point they put in for a Gag Track when they have 0 Training Points in total
